Component.label: Login
Component.Description: A login operation verifies the user's credentials (username and password) to grant access to the reserved sections of the mobile application. The login operation takes in input a username and a password; if verification succeeds, the login operation redirects the user to the home page or operation of the app view. A user has access to a protected resource only if it belongs to one of the groups listed in the Roles property.
Component.InputDescription: The username of the user wishing to login.
The password of the user wishing to login.
The token of the user that refers to the authorization.
